class.name: AbstractDiscreteDistribution

javadoc.text: Abstract base class for all discrete distributions.
javadoc.author: wolfgang.hoschek@cern.ch

javadoc.text: Makes this class non instantiable, but still let's others inherit from it.
Returns a random number from the distribution; returns <tt>(double) nextInt()</tt>.
Returns a random number from the distribution.
